nodes.text: The Revered Masters were spiritual leaders of the Lasat people on Lasan, and often carried around Ashla Staffs—staffs with a special connection to the Force, or as they called it, the Ashla. After the Siege of Lasan, many of the Revered Masters had either died or disappeared, and their staffs were either given to descendants, sold, or acquired by the Galactic Empire.
